entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE LOWER 60S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
